exitDialog.title: Leave without saving?
exitDialog.description: Your progress has been saved as a draft. You can continue from where you left off.

guestUpgrade.title: Become a host
guestUpgrade.description: To create listings and start earning, you need to apply to become a host. It only takes a few minutes.

category.title: What are you listing?
category.subtitle: Choose the type of listing you want to create.

propertyType.title: What type of property?
propertyType.subtitle: Select the option that best describes your property.

vehicleType.title: What type of vehicle?
vehicleType.subtitle: Select the option that best describes your vehicle.

location.title: Where is it located?
location.subtitle: Guests will only get the exact address once they book.
location.mapHint: Click on the map or drag the marker to set the exact location.
location.geoNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
location.geoPermissionDenied: Location permission denied. Please allow access in your browser settings.
location.geoError: Could not get your position. Try again.

basicsStay.title: Tell us about your place
basicsStay.subtitle: Share some basic details about your property.

basicsVehicle.title: Vehicle details
basicsVehicle.subtitle: Tell us more about your vehicle.

amenities.title: What amenities do you offer?
amenities.subtitle: Select all that apply. You can always add more later.

photos.title: Add some photos
photos.subtitle: Great photos help guests imagine staying at your place. Upload at least 1 photo.
photos.fileTooLarge: File too large (max 5MB). Some files were skipped.

titleStep.title: Give your listing a title
titleStep.subtitle: Short titles work best. Be creative!
titleStep.placeholder: e.g. Cozy apartment in the heart of Algiers
titleStep.tip1: Highlight what makes your place special
titleStep.tip2: Mention the neighborhood or a nearby landmark
titleStep.tip3: Keep it under 50 characters for best results

descriptionStep.title: Describe your listing
descriptionStep.subtitle: Share what makes your place special and what guests can expect.
descriptionStep.placeholder: Describe the space, the neighborhood, what guests will love...
descriptionStep.tip1: The space: layout, style, unique features
descriptionStep.tip2: The neighborhood: restaurants, transport, attractions nearby
descriptionStep.tip3: Guest access: private entrance, shared spaces, parking
descriptionStep.tip4: What makes it special: views, history, recent renovation

pricing.title: Set your price
pricing.subtitle: You can change it anytime.
pricing.enableAltCurrency: Also display price in another currency

availability.title: Availability settings
availability.subtitle: Set your booking preferences.
availability.instantBookDesc: Guests can book without waiting for your approval
availability.advanceNoticeDesc: How far in advance guests can book

rules.title: House rules
rules.subtitle: Set clear expectations for your guests.

flexible.label: Flexible
flexible.description: Full refund up to 24 hours before check-in

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.description: Full refund up to 5 days before check-in

strict.label: Strict
strict.description: 50% refund up to 1 week before check-in

strict_long_term.label: Strict (long-term)
strict_long_term.description: Strict policy for stays of 30+ days

review.title: Review your listing
review.subtitle: Here's a summary of your listing. Review it before publishing.

validation.placeMarker: Please place the marker on the map
validation.atLeastOnePhoto: Please upload at least one photo
validation.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 5 characters
validation.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 20 characters

messages.error: Failed to create listing. Please try again.
